notesStmt.note: Englished by C. M. D. M. Cf. B.M.

Pages 19-20 and 29-30 are stained; 59 is misnumbered; 61-62, 92-93, 125-126, 140, 150, 166 and 206 are tightly bound with some loss of text in the filmed copy. Pages 50-65 and 90-210 photographed from British Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
